REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2134 reute r f BC-ESCAGEN-CORP-<ESN>-CO 04-01 0049

TEXT.TITLE: ESCAGEN CORP <ESN> COMPLETES INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Escagen Corp said it has completed an initial offering of common stock, raising 18 mln dlrs, and has completed its previously announced purchase of the assets and business of International Plant Research Institute. Reuter
